Issue.summary: Add block level validations in "kafka to raft migration" shell script
Issue.description: Add "Block level validations" and "Consensus type" validation in the below script while in the process of fetching blocks and updating consensus type in the migration process. https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-test/blob/master/tools/operator/scripts/migrateToRaft.sh
